monster.name: Aruk Thundercaller Thuunlakalaga
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Mountain Born
trait.text: Aruk is acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet.

trait.name: Powerful Build
trait.text: Aruk counts as one size larger when determining his carrying capacity and the weight he can push, drag, or lift.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Aruk makes two attacks with his greataxe or hurls two javelins.

action.name: Greataxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Stone's Endurance (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reaction.text: When Aruk takes damage, it reduces the damage taken by 9 (1d12 + 3).

monster.name: Auril (First Form)
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Auril's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 21, +13 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: chromatic orb (cold orb only; see "Actions" below), detect magic, misty step
2/Day: control weather, detect thoughts, ice storm

monster.spells: Chromatic Orb,Detect Magic,Misty Step,Control Weather,Detect Thoughts,Ice Storm

trait.name: Divine Being
trait.text: Auril can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against her will.

trait.name: Divine Rejuvenation
trait.text: When Auril drops to 0 hit points, her body turns to slush and melts away. Auril instantly reappears in her Auril (second form), in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of where her first form disappeared. Her initiative count doesn't change.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day in This Form)
trait.text: If Auril fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Auril has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: Auril doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Auril attacks twice with her talons.

action.name: Talons
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

action.name: Touch of Frost
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d8) cold damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Chromatic Orb
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +13 to hit, range 90 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d8) cold damage.

legendary.name: Talons
legendary.text: Auril attacks once with her talons.

legendary.name: Teleport
legendary.text: Auril teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 30 feet of her.

monster.name: Auril (Second Form)
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Divine Being
trait.text: Auril can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against her will.

trait.name: Divine Rejuvenation
trait.text: When Auril drops to 0 hit points, her body collapses into shards of ice, whereupon Auril instantly reappears in her Auril (third form), in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of where her second form was destroyed. Her initiative count doesn't change.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day in This Form)
trait.text: If Auril fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Auril has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: Auril doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Auril attacks twice with her ice morningstar or hurls three ice darts.

action.name: Ice Morningstar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

action.name: Ice Dart
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

action.name: Cone of Cold (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
action.text: Auril causes a magical blast of cold air to erupt from her hand. Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a 21 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Create Ice Mephit (3/Day)
action.text: Auril breaks off an icicle from her body and hurls it into an unoccupied space she can see within 20 feet of her, where it magically transforms into an ice mephit (see its entry in the Monster Manual). The mephit acts immediately after Auril in the initiative order and obeys her commands.

action.name: Ice Stasis (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Auril magically creates a gem-sized ice crystal that hovers in a space within 5 feet of her. Auril then targets a creature she can see within 60 feet of the crystal. The target must succeed on a 21 Charisma saving throw or become trapped in the crystal, which is immovable. If the saving throw succeeds, the crystal shatters and nothing else happens. A creature trapped in the crystal is stunned, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the crystal, and takes 21 (6d6) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, freeing itself on a success. The creature is also freed if the crystal is destroyed, which is a Tiny object with AC 18, 9 hit points, and immunity to all damage except fire damage. The freed creature appears in an unoccupied space of its choice within 30 feet of the shattered crystal.

legendary.name: Ice Flurry (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Each creature within 30 feet of Auril takes 5 (2d4) piercing damage from swirling ice, and nonmagical, open flames in that area are extinguished.

legendary.name: Splinter (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Auril uses Create Ice Mephit or causes one to ice mephit she can see within 60 feet of her to explode and die. A mephit that dies in this way does not use its Death Burst. Instead, each creature within 10 feet of the exploding mephit must succeed on a 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 (3d8) piercing damage on a failed saving throw, and half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Auril (Third Form)
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monster.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius), truesight 120 ft.

trait.name: Divine Being
trait.text: Auril can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against her will.

trait.name: Divine Resurrection
trait.text: When Auril drops to 0 hit points, her crystalline form shatters and her divine spark vanishes. She is dead until the next winter solstice, when she reappears at full health in a cold, remote location of her choosing.

trait.name: Frigid Aura
trait.text: So long as Auril has at least 1 hit point in this form, each creature within 10 feet of her takes 10 cold damage at the start of each of her turns.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day in This Form)
trait.text: If Auril fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Auril has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: Auril doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Auril uses Polar Ray twice.

action.name: Polar Ray
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +13 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) cold damage.

action.name: Blizzard Veil
action.text: Auril creates a magical blizzard in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on herself. The area within the sphere is heavily obscured, and the sphere moves with Auril. The effect lasts until Auril drops to 0 hit points in this form, until she chooses to end the effect (no action required), or until her concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell).

legendary.name: Intensify Aura (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Auril's Frigid Aura deals an extra 10 cold damage until the end of her next turn.

legendary.name: Blinding Gleam (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Auril's form flares with a blue light. Each creature that can see Auril and is within 10 feet of her must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded by Auril's magical gleam for 1 minute. The blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Avarice
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Avarice is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14; +6 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt (see "Actions" below), mage hand, message, minor illusion, prestidigitation
1st Level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile
2nd Level (3 slots): flaming sphere, knock, scorching ray
3rd Level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, fly
4th Level (3 slots): banishment, fire shield
5th Level (2 slots): Bigby's hand, Rary's telepathic bond

monster.spells: Fire Bolt,Mage Hand,Message,Minor Illusion,Prestidigitation,Detect Magic,Mage Armor,Magic Missile,Flaming Sphere,Knock,Scorching Ray,Counterspell,Fireball,Fly,Banishment,Fire Shield,Bigby's Hand,Rary's Telepathic Bond

trait.name: Icy Doom
trait.text: When Avarice dies, her corpse freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

trait.name: Special Equipment
trait.text: Avarice wields a staff of frost with 10 charges (see "Actions" below).

action.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d10) fire damage.

action.name: Staff of Frost
action.text: While holding this staff, Avarice can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it (spell save 14): cone of cold (5 charges), fog cloud (1 charge), ice storm (4 charges), or wall of ice (4 charges). The staff regains 1d6 + 4 charges daily at dawn. If its last charge is expended, roll a d20; on a 1, the staff turns to water and is destroyed.

reaction.name: Banishing Rebuke (Recharges after a Long Rest)
reaction.text: When Avarice is damaged by a creature that she can see within 60 feet of her, she can banish that creature to a frigid extradimensional prison for 1 minute. While there, the creature is incapacitated and takes 5 (1d10) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. At the end of each of its turns, the creature can make a 14 Charisma saving throw, escaping the prison on a success and reappearing in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied. A creature that dies in the prison is trapped there indefinitely.

monster.name: Awakened White Moose
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Charge
trait.text: If the moose moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
trait.text: The moose has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The moose makes two attacks: one with its antlers and one with its hooves.

action.name: Antlers
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Battlehammer Dwarf
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
trait.text: The dwarf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
trait.text: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance against poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dwarf makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6 + 0) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

monster.name: Bjornhild Solvigsdottir
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Auril's Blessing (3/Day)
trait.text: When Bjornhild hits a creature with a weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 11 (2d10) cold damage.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Bjornhild makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage, plus 11 (2d10) cold damage if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 11 (2d10) cold damage if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.

monster.name: Brain in a Jar
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monster.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius); see also "detect sentience" below
monster.languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
trait.text: The brain's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: chill touch (see "Actions" below), detect thoughts, mage hand, zone of truth
3/Day: charm person, hold person
1/Day: compulsion, hold monster, sleep (3rd-level version), Tasha's hideous laughter

monster.spells: Chill Touch,Detect Thoughts,Mage Hand,Zone of Truth,Charm Person,Hold Person,Compulsion,Hold Monster,Sleep,Tasha's Hideous Laughter

trait.name: Detect Sentience
trait.text: The brain can sense the presence and location of any creature within 300 feet of it that has an Intelligence of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a mind blank spell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The brain has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The brain doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the brain's next turn. If the target is undead, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against the brain until the end of the brain's next turn.

action.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The brain magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 14 Intelligence saving throw or take 17 (3d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Chardalyn Berserker
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Chardalyn Madness
trait.text: The berserker must roll a d6 at the start of each of its turns. On a 1, the berserker does nothing on its turn except speak to a nonexistent, evil master whom it has pledged to serve.

trait.name: Reckless
trait.text: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The berserker attacks three times with a melee weapon.

action.name: Chardalyn Flail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Chardalyn Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

monster.name: Chardalyn Dragon
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monster.resist: radiant,bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.languages: the languages known by its creator

trait.name: Immutable Form
trait.text: The dragon is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Siege Monster
trait.text: The dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The dragon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, and it gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dragon uses its Malevolent Presence. It then makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its tail. If the dragon isn't flying, it can also make one attack with its wings.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Wings
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d4 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Malevolent Presence
action.text: Any creature with an Intelligence of 4 or more that is within 30 feet of the dragon must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by it for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Malevolent Presence for the next 24 hours. A creature charmed in this way fixates on another creature or object that the dragon mentally chooses and must, on each of its turns, move as close as it can to that target and use its action to make a melee attack against it. If the dragon doesn't choose a target, the charmed creature can act normally on its turn.

action.name: Radiant Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon exhales a ray of radiant energy in a 120-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Chimeric Baboon
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The baboon has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the baboon's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage, plus an extra 3 (1d6) poison damage.

monster.name: Chimeric Cat
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

monster.name: Chimeric Fox
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Keen Hearing
trait.text: The fox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Chimeric Creation
trait.text: The fox has fur that changes color to match its surroundings, giving it advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

monster.name: Chimeric Hare
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Escape
trait.text: The hare can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

monster.name: Chimeric Rat
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Chimeric Creation
trait.text: The rat has gills, iridescent scales, and the ability to breathe air and water.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

monster.name: Chimeric Weasel
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Chimeric Creation
trait.text: The weasel has glowing eyes that emit bright light out in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

monster.name: Chwinga
monster.description: Source: Tomb of Annihilation

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When the chwinga is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The chwinga's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material or verbal components:
At will: druidcraft, guidance, pass without trace, resistance

monster.spells: Druidcraft, Guidance, Pass without Trace, Resistance

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The chwinga doesn't require air, food, or drink. When it dies, it turns into a handful of flower petals, a cloud of pollen, a stone statuette resembling its former self, a tiny sphere of smooth stone, or a puddle of fresh water (your choice).

action.name: Magical Gift (1/Day)
action.text: The chwinga targets a humanoid it can see within S feet of it. The target gains a supernatural charm of the OM's choice. See chapter 7 of the Dungeon Master's Guide for more information on supernatural charms.

action.name: Natural Shelter
action.text: The chwinga magically takes shelter inside a rock, a living plant, or a natural source of fresh water in its space. The chwinga can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect while Inside this shelter, and the shelter doesn't impair the chwinga's blindsight. The chwinga can use its action to emerge from a shelter. If its shelter is destroyed, the chwinga is forced out and appears in the shelter's space, but is otherwise unharmed.

monster.name: Coldlight Walker
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Blinding Light
trait.text: The walker sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. As a bonus action, the walker can target one creature in its bright light that it can see and force it to succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of the walker's next turn.

trait.name: Icy Doom
trait.text: Any creature killed by the walker freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The walker doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The walker makes two attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) cold damage.

action.name: Cold Ray
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +3 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d10 + 3) cold damage.

monster.name: Demos Magen
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Fiery End
trait.text: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The magen makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

monster.name: Dzaan
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Dzaan is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): acid splash, light, minor illusion, shocking grasp
1st Level (4 slots): detect magic, disguise self, magic missile
2nd Level (3 slots): invisibility, levitate, phantasmal force
3rd Level (3 slots): fireball, sending, slow
4th Level (3 slots): arcane eye, confusion
5th Level (1 slots): animate objects

monster.spells: Acid Splash,Light,Minor Illusion,Shocking Grasp,Detect Magic,Disguise Self,Magic Missile,Invisibility,Levitate,Phantasmal Force,Fireball,Sending,Slow,Arcane Eye,Confusion,Animate Objects

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature (the attack roll has advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal). Hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of his next turn.

action.name: Acid Splash (Cantrip)
action.text: Dzaan hurls a bubble of acid at one creature he can see within 60 feet of it, or at two such creatures that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 7 (2d6) acid damage.

action.name: Magic Missile (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
action.text: Dzaan creates three darts of magical force. Each dart unerringly strikes one creature Dzaan can see within 120 feet of it, dealing 3 (1d4 + 1) force damage. If Dzaan casts this spell using a 2nd-level spell slot, he creates one more dart.

monster.name: Dzaan's Simulacrum
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The simulacrum is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): acid splash, light, minor illusion, shocking grasp
1st Level (2 slots): detect magic, disguise self, magic missile
2nd Level (2 slots): invisibility, levitate, phantasmal force

monster.spells: Acid Splash,Light,Minor Illusion,Shocking Grasp,Detect Magic,Disguise Self,Magic Missile,Invisibility,Levitate,Phantasmal Force

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature (the attack roll has advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal). Hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Acid Splash (Cantrip)
action.text: The simulacrum hurls a bubble of acid at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it, or at two such creatures that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 7 (2d6) acid damage.

action.name: Magic Missile (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
action.text: The simulacrum creates three darts of magical force. Each dart unerringly strikes one creature the simulacrum can see within 120 feet of it, dealing 3 (1d4 + 1) force damage. If the simulacrum casts this spell using a 2nd-level spell slot, it creates one more dart.

monster.name: F'yorl
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monster.skill: Arcana +7, Deception +6, Insight +6, Perception +6, Persuasion +6, Stealth +4

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: F'yorl has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

monster.name: Fox
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Keen Hearing
trait.text: The fox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

monster.name: Frost Druid
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monster.speed: 40 ft. (wolf form only), burrow 5 ft. (fox form only),climb 30 ft. (goat form only),fly 60 ft. (owl form only)

trait.name: Spellcasting (Humanoid Form Only)
trait.text: The druid is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 14; +6 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

monster.spells: Druidcraft,Guidance,Resistance,Animal Friendship,Fog Cloud,Speak with Animals,Animal Messenger,Moonbeam,Pass without Trace,Conjure Animals,Sleet Storm,Wind Wall,Hallucinatory Terrain,Ice Storm,Awaken

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The druid makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Ice Sickle (Humanoid Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

action.name: Maul (Beast Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Change Shape
action.text: The druid magically polymorphs into a beast form—fox, mountain goat, owl, or wolf—or back into its humanoid form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the beast form (the druid's choice). It reverts to its humanoid form when it dies. The druid's statistics are the same in each form, except where noted in this stat block.

monster.name: Frost Giant Skeleton

trait.text: The skeleton doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Greataxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage.

action.name: Freezing Stare
action.text: The skeleton targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) cold damage and be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

monster.name: Galvan Magen
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monster.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Fiery End
trait.text: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Shocking Touch
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target (the magen has advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal). Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) lightning damage.

action.name: Static Discharge (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The magen discharges a lightning bolt in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw (with disadvantage if the creature is wearing armor made of metal), taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Giant Walrus

trait.name: Hold Breath

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Body Flop
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tusks
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) piercing damage.

monster.name: Gnoll Vampire
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monster.resist: necrotic,bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The vampire has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Rampage
trait.text: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the vampire can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Regeneration
trait.text: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

monster.trait: Shapechanger If the vampire isn't in sunlight, it can use its action to polymorph into a Large hyena or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form. While in hyena form, the vampire can't speak, and its walking speed is 50 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies., While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. it is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The vampire doesn't require air.

monster.trait: Vampire Weaknesses The vampire has the following flaws: Enraged by Celestial. If it hears words of Celestial spoken, the vampire must try to attack the source of those spoken words on its next turn. If these words come from multiple sources and from opposite directions, the vampire is restrained. Otherwise, it moves to attack what it perceives to be the closest source. Repulsed by Perfume. The vampire has disadvantage on melee attack rolls made against any creature wearing perfume or carrying an open container of it., Stake to the Heart. If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is paralyzed until the stake is removed. Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
action.text: The vampire makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite (Hyena or Vampire Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. the target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

action.name: Claws (Vampire Form Only)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage.

action.name: Frightful Cackle (Hyena or Vampire Form Only)
action.text: The vampire emits a bone-chilling cackle. Each creature of the vampire's choice that is within 120 feet of the vampire and can hear its cackle must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the vampire's Frightful Cackle for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Sickening Gaze (Hyena or Vampire Form Only)
action.text: The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic or be poisoned for 24 hours. A creature whose saving throw is successful is immune to this vampire's Sickening Gaze for 24 hours.

monster.name: Gnome Ceremorph
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
trait.text: The ceremorph's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: detect thoughts, levitate
1/Day: dominate monster, plane shift (self only)

monster.spells: Detect Thoughts,Levitate,Dominate Monster,Plane Shift

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The ceremorph has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Tentacles
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape 9) and must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

action.name: Extract Brain
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the ceremorph. Hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ceremorph kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Laser Pistol
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) radiant damage.

action.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The ceremorph magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Extract Brain

trait.text: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Magic Resistance

action.name: Psychic Lash
action.text: The magen's eyes glow silver as it targets one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, one creature directly underneath the ice piercer. Hit: 10 (3d6) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage. Miss: The ice piercer takes half the normal falling damage for the distance fallen.

monster.name: Ice Troll

trait.text: While it's alive, the troll generates an aura of bitter cold that fills the area within 10 feet of it. At the start of the troll's turn, all nonmagical flames in the aura are extinguished. Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the troll takes 10 (3d6) cold damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The ice troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
trait.text: The ice troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The ice troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

If the target takes any of the cold damage, the target must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on its attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

monster.name: Kobold Vampire Spawn
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monster.resist: necrotic,bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The vampire has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vampire's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Regeneration
trait.text: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The vampire doesn't require air.

monster.trait: Vampire Weaknesses The vampire has the following flaws: Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants., Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it starts its turn in running water., Stake to the Heart. The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is incapacitated in its resting place., Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

monster.name: Living Bigby's Hand
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The living spell doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Force Fist
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (4d8 + 8) force damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the living spell can move it up to 5 feet and move with it, without provoking opportunity attacks.

action.name: Grasping Hand
action.text: The living spell attempts to grab a Huge or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 15 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape 15). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The living spell can grapple only one creature at a time and can't use Force Fist until the grapple ends.

monster.name: Living Blade of Disaster
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monster.immune: poison,bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unfettered
trait.text: The living spell can move through any barrier, even a wall of magical force.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The living spell doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Force Blade
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (4d12) force damage, unless the living spell rolled an 18 or higher on the d20 for the attack, in which case the attack is a critical hit that deals 78 (12d12) force damage instead.

reaction.name: Preemptive Strike
reaction.text: The living spell makes a melee attack against a creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the living spell.

monster.name: Living Demiplane
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Dimensional Form
trait.text: The living spell can enter another creature's space and vice versa, and it can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. The living spell can't detach from a solid surface, such as a wall, ceiling, or floor. If it has no surface to attach to, the living spell is destroyed (see "Planar Destruction" below).

trait.name: Extradimensional Chamber
trait.text: When the living spell enters another creature's space (or vice versa) for the first time on a turn, the other creature must succeed on a 10 Dexterity saving throw or be pulled into the living spell's extradimensional space, an unfurnished stone chamber 30 feet in every dimension. A creature too big to fit in this space succeeds on the saving throw automatically. Creatures in the chamber never run out of breathable air. Magic that enables transit between planes, such as plane shift, can be used to escape the chamber, which has no exits otherwise. Creatures trapped inside the extradimensional chamber can't see, target, or deal damage to the living spell; however, they can damage the room around them. Each 5-foot-square section of ceiling, wall, and floor in the chamber has AC 17, 50 hit points, immunity to poison and psychic damage, and immunity to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage that is nonmagical. If any section is reduced to 0 hit points, the living spell and its chamber are destroyed (see "Planar Destruction" below).

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Planar Destruction
trait.text: The living spell is destroyed when it or a 5-foot-square section of its extradimensional chamber is reduced to 0 hit points, or when the living spell has no surface to attach to. When the living spell is destroyed, the contents of its extradimensional chamber are expelled, appearing as close to the living spell's previous location as possible. Each expelled creature appears in a randomly determined unoccupied space, along with whatever it is wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The living spell doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

monster.name: Lonelywood Banshee
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monster.resist: acid,fire,lightning,thunder,bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Detect Life
trait.text: The banshee can magically sense the presence of creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
trait.text: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

action.name: Spectral Longbow
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) necrotic damage.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
action.text: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the banshee that can see her must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Wail (1/Day)
action.text: The banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 feet of her that can hear her must make a 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success, a creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

trait.text: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
trait.text: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

monster.resist: acid,fire,lightning,thunder,bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Spellcasting

Cantrips (at will): mage hand, message, prestidigitation, ray of frost
1st Level (4 slots): detect magic, thunderwave
2nd Level (3 slots):
3rd Level (3 slots): counterspell

monster.spells: Mage Hand,Message,Prestidigitation,Ray of Frost,Detect Magic,Thunderwave,Counterspell

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
trait.text: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
trait.text: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Withering Touch
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
action.text: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
action.text: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the ghost that can see it must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages 1d4 × 10 years. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed by a greater restoration spell, but only if it is cast within 24 hours.

action.name: Possession (Recharge 6)
action.text: One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 14 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies. The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or the ghost is turned or forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

At will: misty step

trait.text: If the temperature around him is 0 degrees Fahrenheit or lower, Sephek regains 5 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of Sephek's next turn. Sephek dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Sephek attacks twice with a weapon.

action.name: Ice Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if Sephek uses the weapon with two hands, plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

action.name: Ice Dagger
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

monster.immune: cold,poison,bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Cold Absorption
trait.text: Whenever the golem is subjected to cold damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the cold damage dealt.

trait.name: Immutable Form
trait.text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Melt
trait.text: While in an area of extreme heat, the golem loses 1d6 hit points at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

action.name: Snowball
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) cold damage.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
trait.text: The snowy owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: Beak
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws

At will: fire bolt, mage hand, shocking grasp
3: silent image
1/Day: chromatic orb, crown of madness, shield

trait.text: Spellix has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit (with advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

monster.name: Sperm Whale
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Echolocation
trait.text: The whale can't use its blindsight while deafened.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The whale can hold its breath for 90 minutes.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
trait.text: The whale has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The whale makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 14 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the whale. A swallowed creature has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the whale, and it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of the whale's turns. If the whale takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the whale must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the whale. If the whale dies, a swallowed creature can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage, or 37 (6d6 + 16) bludgeoning damage if the target is an object.

monster.name: Spitting Mimic
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Shapechanger
trait.text: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
trait.text: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape 16). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
trait.text: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

trait.name: Grappler
trait.text: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The mimic has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The mimic attacks three times: twice with its pseudopods and once with its bite.

action.name: Pseudopods
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

action.name: Spit Acid (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The mimic spits acid at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 32 (9d6 + 1) acid damage on failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Telepathic Pentacle
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The Telepathic Pentacle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

monster.trait: Multiple Heads The Telepathic Pentacle has five heads. While it has more than one head, the Telepathic Pentacle has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious. Whenever the Telepathic Pentacle takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the Telepathic Pentacle dies., At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The Telepathic Pentacle regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
trait.text: For each head the Telepathic Pentacle has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Wakeful
trait.text: While the Telepathic Pentacle sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The Telepathic Pentacle makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

monster.name: Tomb Tapper
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monster.languages: understands Common and Undercommon but doesn't speak,telepathy 60 ft.

trait.name: Petrified Death
trait.text: A tomb tapper reduced to 0 hit points turns into a lifeless stone statue. Anything it's wearing or carrying is not transformed.

trait.name: Sense Magic
trait.text: The tomb tapper senses magic within 30 feet of it and can use an action to pinpoint the location of any creature, object, or area in that range that bears magic. This sense penetrates barriers but is blocked by a thin sheet of lead.

trait.name: Tunneler
trait.text: The tomb tapper can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-wide, 20-foot-tall tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The tomb tapper doesn't require air or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The tomb tapper makes two melee attacks with its sledgehammer or with its claws. If it hits the same creature with both claws, it can pull that creature within 5 feet of its mouth and make a bite attack against it.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage.

action.name: Sledgehammer
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (6d6 + 6) bludgeoning or force damage (tomb tapper's choice). If thrown, the hammer returns to the tomb tapper at the end of its turn, landing at the tomb tapper's feet if it doesn't have a hand free to catch the weapon.

monster.name: Tribal Warrior Spore Servants
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monster.name: Vellynne Harpell
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Vellynne is an 8th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): chill touch (see "Actions" below), light, mage hand, message, prestidigitation
1st Level (4 slots): comprehend languages, detect magic, ray of sickness, Tasha's hideous laughter
2nd Level (3 slots): darkvision, hold person, ray of enfeeblement
3rd Level (3 slots): animate dead, Leomund's tiny hut, vampiric touch (see "Actions" below)
4th Level (2 slots): arcane eye, blight

monster.spells: Chill Touch,Light,Mage Hand,Message,Prestidigitation,Comprehend Languages,Detect Magic,Ray of Sickness,Tasha's Hideous Laughter,Darkvision,Hold Person,Ray of Enfeeblement,Animate Dead,Leomund's Tiny Hut,Vampiric Touch,Arcane Eye,Blight

trait.name: Special Equipment
trait.text: Vellynne wears bracers of defense and carries a wand of magic missiles (see "Actions" below).

action.name: Vampiric Touch (3rd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, and Vellynne regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt. If Vellynne casts this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the necrotic damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

action.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of Vellynne's next turn.

action.name: Wand of Magic Missiles
action.text: While holding this wand, Vellynne can expend 1 or more of its 7 charges to cast the magic missile spell from it. She can expend 1 charge to cast the 1st-level version of the spell. She can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge she expends. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If the wand's last charge is expended, roll a d20; on a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

monster.name: Verbeeg Longstrider
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The verbeeg's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
1/Day: animal messenger, fog cloud, freedom of movement, pass without trace, silence, water walk

monster.spells: Animal Messenger,Fog Cloud,Freedom of Movement,Pass without Trace,Silence,Water Walk

trait.name: Simple Weapon Wielder
trait.text: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The verbeeg makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Sling
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (3d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

monster.name: Verbeeg Marauder
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Simple Weapon Wielder
trait.text: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The verbeeg makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monster.name: Walrus
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The walrus can hold its breath for 10 minutes.

action.name: Tusks
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

monster.name: Xardorok Sunblight
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Xardorok's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: eldritch blast (see "Actions" below), mage hand
1/Day: hold person, suggestion

monster.spells: Eldritch Blast,Mage Hand,Hold Person,Suggestion

trait.name: Duergar Resilience
trait.text: Xardorok has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, Xardorok has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Xardorok attacks twice with a weapon or casts eldritch blast twice.

action.name: Spiked Gauntlet
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, or 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage while Xardorok is enlarged.

action.name: Eldritch Blast (Cantrip)
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) force damage.

action.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
action.text: For 1 minute, Xardorok magically increases in size, along with anything he is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, Xardorok is Large, doubles his damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in his attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If Xardorok lacks the room to become Large, he attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

action.name: Invisibility (Recharge 4-6)
action.text: Xardorok magically turns invisible until he attacks, he casts a spell, he uses his Enlarge, or his concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment Xardorok wears or carries is invisible with him.

reaction.name: Hellish Rebuke (2/Day)
reaction.text: When Xardorok is damaged by a creature within 60 feet of him that he can see, the creature that damaged him is engulfed in hellish flames and must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Yeti Tyke
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
trait.text: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.

monster.name: Young Griffon (Medium)
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Keen Sight
trait.text: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.

monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Keen Sight
trait.text: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage.

monster.name: Young Griffon (Tiny)
monster.description: Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

trait.name: Keen Sight
trait.text: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.
